snippet: The outcome of American elections affect the entire world -- yet most people outside the United States (and many inside) don't understand American politics. I anchored our livestreaming coverage from the Republican convention and will do the same at...
abstract: The outcome of American elections affect the entire world -- yet most people outside the United States (and many inside) don't understand American politics. I anchored our livestreaming coverage from the Republican convention and will do the same at the Democrats. Send me your questions about American politics, the political parties and Barack Obama and Mitt Romney.

headline.main: What I Saw at the Republican Convention
